prism

Class SCCComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • prism.SCCComputer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SCCComputerLockstep, SCCComputerSCCFind, SCCComputerXB

    public abstract class SCCComputer
extends PrismComponent
    Abstract class for (symbolic) classes that compute (B)SCCs, i.e. (bottom) strongly connected components, for a model's transition graph.

      • computeSCCs

        public abstract void computeSCCs()
                          throws PrismException
        Compute (non-trivial) strongly connected components (SCCs) and store them. They should be retrieved using getSCCs(). States in trivial SCCs (those comprising a single state without a self-loop) are also stored. They should be retrieved using getNotInSCCs(). You will need to to deref all of these afterwards.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeSCCs

        public abstract void computeSCCs(JDDNode filter)
                          throws PrismException
        Compute (non-trivial) strongly connected components (SCCs) containing a state from filter and store them. They should be retrieved using getSCCs(). States in trivial SCCs (those comprising a single state without a self-loop) are also stored. They should be retrieved using getNotInSCCs(). You will need to to deref all of these afterwards.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • getSCCs

        public java.util.List<JDDNode> getSCCs()
        Get the list of computed (non-trivial) SCCs. You need to deref these BDDs when you are finished with them.

      • getNotInSCCs

        public JDDNode getNotInSCCs()
        Get the states not in any (non-trivial) SCC. In other words, this is all states in trivial SCCs (those comprising a single state without a self-loop). You need to deref this BDD when you are finished with it.

      • getBSCCs

        public java.util.List<JDDNode> getBSCCs()
        Get the list of computed BSCCs. You need to deref these BDDs when you are finished with them.

      • getNotInBSCCs

        public JDDNode getNotInBSCCs()
        Get the states not in any BSCC. You need to deref this BDDs when you are finished with it.

      • computeBSCCs

        public void computeBSCCs()
                  throws PrismException
        Compute bottom strongly connected components (BSCCs) and store them. They should be retrieved using getBSCCs(). States that are not in any BSCC are also stored. They should be retrieved using getNotInBSCCs(). You will need to to deref all of these afterwards.
        Throws:
        PrismException
